member.name: T:Zambon.Core.Database.ChangeTracker.CoreChangeTracker
member.summary: Custom ChangeTracker used to track instances of all objects before actually saving in database.

member.summary: Default constructor.
member.param: Service for accessing the distributed cache.
Serviceo for accessing the instance key.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ChangeTracker.CoreChangeTracker.LoadObjects(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContext)
member.summary: Read all objects in database and loads them into the EF DbContext.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ChangeTracker.CoreChangeTracker.Add``1(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.EntityEntry{``0},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add an object into the ChangeTracker.
member.param: The object instance.
Should save in temporary edited objects or already applied changes.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ChangeTracker.CoreChangeTracker.Remove(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes an object from ChangeTracker
member.param: The ModelType of the entity as string.
The object ID of the entity.
Removes only from temp store or from both.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ChangeTracker.CoreChangeTracker.Clear(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clears the stored entities in distributed cache.
member.param: If should clear the stored entities with changes already applyed.
If should clear the temp stored entities.
Filters the temp model to clean only this same type.
Force to clean all entities in temp.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ChangeTracker.CoreChangeTracker.SaveObjects``1(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContext,``0)
member.summary: Saves all changes made in this context to the database.
member.param: The DbContext instance.
The entity to be saved.

member.summary: Guid unique to each user.

Current user ID.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ChangeTracker.InstanceKey.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this string.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ChangeTracker.InstanceKey.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether this instance and a specified System.Guid object represent the same value.
member.param: An object to compare to this instance.
member.returns: true if g is equal to this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ChangeTracker.InstanceKey.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the value of this instance in registry format.
member.returns: The value of this System.Guid plus the current user ID, formatted by using the format specifier as follows: xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx_####.

member.summary: Retrieves the current user instance key.

member.name: T:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext
member.summary: A DbContext instance represents a session with the database and can be used to query and save instances of your entities. DbContext is a combination of the Unit Of Work and Repository patterns.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext.#ctor(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContext class using the specified options. The Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContext.OnConfiguring(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptionsBuilder) method will still be called to allow further configuration of the options.
member.param: The options for this context.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext.OnModelCreating(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ModelBuilder)
member.summary: Override this method to further configure the model that was discovered by convention from the entity types exposed in Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbSet`1 properties on your derived context. The resulting model may be cached and re-used for subsequent instances of your derived context.
member.param: The builder being used to construct the model for this context. Databases (and other extensions) typically define extension methods on this object that allow you to configure aspects of the model that are specific to a given database.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext.LoadTrackedEntities
member.summary: Load tracked entities already stored in distributed cache.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext.ClearTrackedEntities(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clears the stored entities in distributed cache.
member.param: If should clear the stored entities with changes already applyed.
If should clear the temp stored entities.
Filters the temp model to clean only this same type.
Force to clean all entities in temp.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext.ApplyChanges``1(``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Applies the changed properties into distributed cache, without saving into database.
member.param: The entity instance.
If should save into temp or in tracked items.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext.ApplyChanges``1(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.EntityEntry{``0},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Applies the changed properties into distributed cache, without saving into database.
member.param: The database entry instance.
If should save into temp or in tracked items.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext.RemoveTrackedEntity``1(``0)
member.summary: Remove the specified entity from the already tracked entities.
member.param: The entity instance.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext.RemoveTrackedEntity(System.Type,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrives the entity using the ID and remove it from the already tracked entities.
member.param: Type of the entity.
The entity id.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext.SaveChanges``1(``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves all changes made in this context to the database.
member.param: The entity should be saved into the database.
If set to true will use a transaction to save the entity into the database. Default true.
member.returns: The number of state entries written to the database.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext.Set(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbSet`1 that can be used to query and save instances of TEntity.
member.param: The type of entity for which a set should be returned.
member.returns: A set for the given entity type.

member.name: T:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContextFactory
member.summary: A factory for creating derived Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContext instances. Implement this interface to enable design-time services for context types that do not have a public default constructor. At design-time, derived Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContext instances can be created in order to enable specific design-time experiences such as Migrations. Design-time services will automatically discover implementations of this interface that are in the startup assembly or the same assembly as the derived context.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContextFactory.CreateDbContext(System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a derived context.
member.param: Arguments provided by the design-time service.
member.returns: An instance of CoreDbContext.

member.summary: Generates initial database data

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ICoreDbSeedData.SeedData(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ModelBuilder)
member.summary: Used to seed the initial data, called after adding the entity types into the model.
member.param: The builder being used to construct the model for this context. Databases (and other extensions) typically define extension methods on this object that allow you to configure aspects of the model that are specific to a given database.

member.name: T:Zambon.Core.Database.ExtensionMethods.DbSetExtension
member.summary: Extension methods to manipulate database objects.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ExtensionMethods.DbSetExtension.IsValid``1(``0,Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}}@)
member.summary: Validate the an entity.
member.param: Instance of the object.
Database context instance.
Exposes the errors list if having any.
member.returns: Returns true if no errors were found.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ExtensionMethods.DbSetExtension.Delete``1(Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deletes an object from database. If the object is of type DBObject, then will only set the IsDeleted property to true, otherwise will delete.
member.param: Database context instance.
ID of the object to be deleted.
If should or not use transaction when deleting.
member.returns: Returns an instance of the deleted object.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Database.ExtensionMethods.DbSetExtension.Merge(Zambon.Core.Database.CoreDbContext,Zambon.Core.Database.Interfaces.IKeyed,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Merge the actual database values with the object from Core Change Tracker.
member.param: Database context instance.
The instance returned from the action.
List of user informed fields.
member.returns: Returns the merged entity.
